title: Meg Whitman on 'Challenging Environment' for Leaders
itunes:title: Meg Whitman on 'Challenging Environment' for Leaders
description:
Quibi CEO Meg Whitman discusses the launch of the mobile-only streaming entertainment platform. She also talks about how media, politics and work will all change as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. Susan Lyne, Founder and Managing Partner at BBG Ventures, discusses how the coronavirus outbreak is impacting the startup world. She explains why streaming media is doing well and talks about the tech, commerce and services companies in her portfolio.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
